textbooks.title: Systems Thinking: Managing Chaos and Complexity
textbooks.author: Jamshid Gharajedaghi

textbooks.title: Systems Thinking: Coping with 21st Century Problems
textbooks.author: John Boardman and Brian Sauser

assignments.description: Class Participation - Expected to participate in class discussion board.
Assignments - Must be completed by the required date and submitted on Canvas.
Individual assignment presentation - Prepare Power Point slides and present online.
Final Project - Application of all learned concepts presented in written format.

policies.academic_integrity: Assignments may be submitted to www.turnitin.com for originality evaluation.

additional_info.course_format: Recorded lectures, online Q&A and discussions, individual assignments, and final projects.

_metadata.course_description: Systems Thinking is an introductory course to a systemic philosophy of thinking.
learning_outcomes: Understanding the concept of systemic phenomena
Learning the constructing blocks of systems thinking as a paradigm and philosophy
Practicing systemic tools in formulating complex problems
